name: Diva Washing Powder, Purple Lotus
description: Diva Detergent powder with Rose & Lime gives your clothes a long lasting fragrance with “Perfume Magic” . The "Fiber Clean" technology of Diva detergent powder will attack body oil and sweat on clothes while Optical Brighteners will give your clothes the new and fresh look you’ve always dreamed of.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
